import dill as pickle
from yuno.search import pipelines,base,config,utils
import torch
import torch.nn.functional as F
import faiss
import gc
import numpy as np
from dataclasses import dataclass
import yuno.ui.base as uBase
from yuno.ui.templates import Templates
from ipywidgets import (Layout,Box,HTML,Output,Text,Button)

DEVICE = "cuda"
with open("/kaggle/input/yuno-search-data/search_base.pkl","rb") as f:
  search_base = pickle.load(f)

INDEX = faiss.IndexFlatL2(1280)
INDEX.add(np.vstack([search_base._search_data[data_uid].embedding 
                     for data_uid in search_base._data_uids
                     ]))

search_base = base.SearchBase(search_base.model,INDEX,
                              search_base._data_uids,
                              search_base._search_data,
                              search_base._animes,
                              search_base._tags,
                              search_base._tag_cats,
                              search_base._genres)
with open("/kaggle/input/yunosearchinfo/info_base.pkl", "rb") as f:
    info_base = pickle.load(f)
gc.collect()



pipeline = pipelines.DefaultPipleline.new(search_base,config.default_cfg)

# Yuno

Yuno is the world's first context based search engine that reads over 0.5 Million anime reviews and other informations . To help you find anime with specific properties .

This search engine was created to solve the problem of finding an object that has some specific properties the object being Anime in this case.

**source code:** https://github.com/IAmPara0x/Yuno

**How Yuno Works?:** https://medium.com/@confusedstudent13/yuno-context-based-search-engine-for-anime-39f5cb86f845


**NOTE**
Please avoid doing these two things otherwise it will lead to very bad search results:
1. Don't make spelling mistakes
2. Don't type name of anime/characters,just type what properties you are looking for in an anime.
   * Don't type: anime like attack on titans
   * Type : action anime with great character development and amazing story.
   
   (or something like this)
  
## To Start Yuno
Just click on `Run All`. And Then wait until everything gets ready. (This will take around 50 secs)
